bioconda.name: bioconductor-genetclassifier
bioconda.summary: Classify diseases and build associated gene networks using gene expression profiles

biotools.summary: Comprehensive package to automatically train and validate a multi-class SVM classifier based on gene expression data. Provides transparent selection of gene markers, their coexpression networks, and an interface to query the classifier.

bioschemas.name: geNetClassifier
bioschemas.summary: Comprehensive package to automatically train and validate a multi-class SVM classifier based on gene expression data. Provides transparent selection of gene markers, their coexpression networks, and an interface to query the classifier.
